channel.title: Shellcode-Tricks on ZER0-Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Shellcode-Tricks on ZER0-Blog

item.title: tricks
item.description: 常用系统调用号 syscall 64位 0->read 1->write 2->open 5->fstat 9->mmap 0xa->mprotect 0xf->rt_sigreturn 0x3b->execve 0x5a->chmod int 0x80 32位 3->read 4->write 5->open 0xb->execve 有时候受字长限制可以考虑eax,ax,al这种寄存器,让shellcode变短 cd
